events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The EV battery supply chain encompasses the sourcing, processing, and manufacturing of critical materials essential for electric vehicles, including lithium, nickel, cobalt, manganese, graphite, and rare earth elements.
events.description: The EV battery supply chain encompasses the sourcing, processing, and manufacturing of critical materials essential for electric vehicles, including lithium, nickel, cobalt, manganese, graphite, and rare earth elements.

events.name: Raw Material Extraction
events.wd_description: EVs require significantly more minerals such as copper, lithium, nickel, cobalt, manganese, graphite, and rare earth elements compared to conventional cars.
events.description: EVs require significantly more minerals such as copper, lithium, nickel, cobalt, manganese, graphite, and rare earth elements compared to conventional cars.

events.name: Supply and Demand Imbalance
events.wd_description: The rapid expansion of demand for critical materials and long production lead times result in supply shortages and price volatility.
events.description: The rapid expansion of demand for critical materials and long production lead times result in supply shortages and price volatility.

events.name: Geopolitical Concentration
events.wd_description: High concentration of critical raw material production in specific countries or regions raises concerns among governments of resource-importing countries.
events.description: High concentration of critical raw material production in specific countries or regions raises concerns among governments of resource-importing countries.

events.name: Responsible Sourcing
events.wd_description: Buyers, producers, and traders prioritize responsible sourcing, with mandatory compliance audits and reforms in purchasing rules by major companies.
events.description: Buyers, producers, and traders prioritize responsible sourcing, with mandatory compliance audits and reforms in purchasing rules by major companies.

events.name: Governance and Transparency
events.wd_description: Implementing robust governance frameworks, enhancing transparency, and promoting sustainable practices are crucial for ensuring ESG standards and decarbonizing the commodity supply chains.
events.description: Implementing robust governance frameworks, enhancing transparency, and promoting sustainable practices are crucial for ensuring ESG standards and decarbonizing the commodity supply chains.

events.name: Challenges and Opportunities
events.wd_description: The EV revolution presents significant challenges and opportunities, necessitating interdisciplinary research to navigate global value chains and the changing geopolitical landscape.
events.description: The EV revolution presents significant challenges and opportunities, necessitating interdisciplinary research to navigate global value chains and the changing geopolitical landscape.

events.name: Demand Growth
events.wd_description: The demand for critical materials such as lithium, nickel, cobalt, manganese, graphite, and rare earth elements is exponentially growing due to the adoption of emerging technologies and the EV revolution.
events.description: The demand for critical materials such as lithium, nickel, cobalt, manganese, graphite, and rare earth elements is exponentially growing due to the adoption of emerging technologies and the EV revolution.

events.name: Lithium Demand
events.wd_description: The global demand for lithium is expected to increase significantly, up to 89 times the current demand by 2050.
events.description: The global demand for lithium is expected to increase significantly, up to 89 times the current demand by 2050.

events.name: Nickel Demand
events.wd_description: Nickel is crucial for battery cathodes, with increasing demand driven by the growth of electric vehicles and renewable energy storage.
events.description: Nickel is crucial for battery cathodes, with increasing demand driven by the growth of electric vehicles and renewable energy storage.

events.name: Cobalt Demand
events.wd_description: Cobalt demand is rising due to its use in battery production, despite efforts to reduce dependency due to supply chain and ethical concerns.
events.description: Cobalt demand is rising due to its use in battery production, despite efforts to reduce dependency due to supply chain and ethical concerns.

events.name: Manganese Demand
events.wd_description: Manganese is an important component in battery technology, contributing to the overall performance and stability of batteries.
events.description: Manganese is an important component in battery technology, contributing to the overall performance and stability of batteries.

events.name: Graphite Demand
events.wd_description: Graphite is essential for battery anodes, with increasing demand driven by the expansion of electric vehicles and portable electronics.
events.description: Graphite is essential for battery anodes, with increasing demand driven by the expansion of electric vehicles and portable electronics.

events.name: Rare Earth Elements Demand
events.wd_description: Rare earth elements are crucial for electric motors and other components, with demand rising due to the growth in electric vehicle production.
events.description: Rare earth elements are crucial for electric motors and other components, with demand rising due to the growth in electric vehicle production.

events.name: Long Lead Times
events.wd_description: Meeting the growing demand for critical materials involves long lead times for production, averaging around 16.5 years, leading to supply shortages and price volatility.
events.description: Meeting the growing demand for critical materials involves long lead times for production, averaging around 16.5 years, leading to supply shortages and price volatility.

events.name: Production Delays
events.wd_description: The production of critical materials involves lengthy processes and significant investments, contributing to delays in meeting demand.
events.description: The production of critical materials involves lengthy processes and significant investments, contributing to delays in meeting demand.

events.name: Supply Shortages
events.wd_description: Due to long production lead times and growing demand, supply shortages are becoming increasingly common for critical materials.
events.description: Due to long production lead times and growing demand, supply shortages are becoming increasingly common for critical materials.

events.name: Price Volatility
events.wd_description: Supply shortages and high demand contribute to significant price volatility in the market for critical materials.
events.description: Supply shortages and high demand contribute to significant price volatility in the market for critical materials.

events.name: Geopolitical Concentration
events.wd_description: The concentration of critical raw material production in certain countries or regions raises concerns among governments of resource-importing countries.
events.description: The concentration of critical raw material production in certain countries or regions raises concerns among governments of resource-importing countries.

events.name: China
events.wd_description: China holds a significant share of global production for several critical raw materials, including rare earth elements.
events.description: China holds a significant share of global production for several critical raw materials, including rare earth elements.

events.name: Russia
events.wd_description: Russia is a major producer of several critical materials essential for EV batteries, such as nickel and cobalt.
events.description: Russia is a major producer of several critical materials essential for EV batteries, such as nickel and cobalt.

events.name: Australia
events.wd_description: Australia has significant reserves and production capabilities for key EV battery materials, including lithium and manganese.
events.description: Australia has significant reserves and production capabilities for key EV battery materials, including lithium and manganese.

events.name: African Countries
events.wd_description: Several African countries are key producers of critical raw materials, with the Democratic Republic of Congo being a major source of cobalt.
events.description: Several African countries are key producers of critical raw materials, with the Democratic Republic of Congo being a major source of cobalt.

events.name: Responsible Sourcing
events.wd_description: Increasingly, stakeholders in the EV battery supply chain are prioritizing responsible sourcing practices to ensure ethical and sustainable procurement of materials.
events.description: Increasingly, stakeholders in the EV battery supply chain are prioritizing responsible sourcing practices to ensure ethical and sustainable procurement of materials.

events.name: Compliance Audits
events.wd_description: Mandatory compliance audits, such as those by the London Metal Exchange for cobalt, ensure adherence to ethical sourcing guidelines.
events.description: Mandatory compliance audits, such as those by the London Metal Exchange for cobalt, ensure adherence to ethical sourcing guidelines.

events.name: Purchasing Reforms
events.wd_description: Major buyers like Apple, VW, and Tesla have reformed their purchasing rules to prioritize responsible sourcing of materials.
events.description: Major buyers like Apple, VW, and Tesla have reformed their purchasing rules to prioritize responsible sourcing of materials.

events.name: Artisanal Mining Control
events.wd_description: Measures to control artisanal mining, such as those by Huayou Cobalt, aim to improve ethical sourcing and reduce environmental and social impacts.
events.description: Measures to control artisanal mining, such as those by Huayou Cobalt, aim to improve ethical sourcing and reduce environmental and social impacts.

events.name: Governance and Transparency
events.wd_description: Implementing robust governance frameworks, enhancing transparency, and promoting sustainable practices are crucial for ensuring ESG standards and decarbonizing the commodity supply chains.
events.description: Implementing robust governance frameworks, enhancing transparency, and promoting sustainable practices are crucial for ensuring ESG standards and decarbonizing the commodity supply chains.

events.name: Governance Frameworks
events.wd_description: Various countries and organizations are developing governance frameworks to regulate the extraction and processing of critical materials for the EV supply chain.
events.description: Various countries and organizations are developing governance frameworks to regulate the extraction and processing of critical materials for the EV supply chain.

events.name: Transparency Mechanisms
events.wd_description: Implementing transparency mechanisms ensures that the sourcing and supply chain processes are visible and accountable.
events.description: Implementing transparency mechanisms ensures that the sourcing and supply chain processes are visible and accountable.

events.name: Sustainable Practices
events.wd_description: Adopting sustainable practices in the extraction and processing of materials reduces environmental impacts and promotes long-term viability.
events.description: Adopting sustainable practices in the extraction and processing of materials reduces environmental impacts and promotes long-term viability.

events.name: Challenges and Opportunities
events.wd_description: The EV revolution presents significant challenges and opportunities, necessitating interdisciplinary research to navigate global value chains and the changing geopolitical landscape.
events.description: The EV revolution presents significant challenges and opportunities, necessitating interdisciplinary research to navigate global value chains and the changing geopolitical landscape.

events.name: Developed Countries
events.wd_description: Developed countries face the challenge of securing stable supplies of critical materials while benefiting from the growth of the EV market.
events.description: Developed countries face the challenge of securing stable supplies of critical materials while benefiting from the growth of the EV market.

events.name: Developing Countries
events.wd_description: Developing countries can capitalize on the opportunities presented by the EV revolution but must address challenges related to governance and infrastructure.
events.description: Developing countries can capitalize on the opportunities presented by the EV revolution but must address challenges related to governance and infrastructure.

events.name: Interdisciplinary Research
events.wd_description: Addressing the challenges and opportunities of the EV revolution requires interdisciplinary research spanning various fields.
events.description: Addressing the challenges and opportunities of the EV revolution requires interdisciplinary research spanning various fields.

events.name: Economic Growth
events.wd_description: The EV revolution drives economic growth in both developed and developing countries, creating new opportunities in the supply chain.
events.description: The EV revolution drives economic growth in both developed and developing countries, creating new opportunities in the supply chain.

events.name: Job Creation
events.wd_description: The expansion of the EV battery supply chain results in the creation of new jobs in mining, processing, and manufacturing sectors.
events.description: The expansion of the EV battery supply chain results in the creation of new jobs in mining, processing, and manufacturing sectors.

events.name: Infrastructure Development
events.wd_description: Investment in infrastructure supports the growth of the EV battery supply chain, including transportation and production facilities.
events.description: Investment in infrastructure supports the growth of the EV battery supply chain, including transportation and production facilities.

events.name: Governance Challenges
events.wd_description: Developing countries face governance challenges in managing the extraction and processing of critical materials, impacting their ability to capitalize on the EV revolution.
events.description: Developing countries face governance challenges in managing the extraction and processing of critical materials, impacting their ability to capitalize on the EV revolution.

events.name: Regulatory Gaps
events.wd_description: Inadequate regulatory frameworks can hinder effective management and sustainable development of the critical materials sector.
events.description: Inadequate regulatory frameworks can hinder effective management and sustainable development of the critical materials sector.

events.name: Corruption
events.wd_description: Corruption can undermine governance efforts, leading to exploitation and unsustainable practices in the critical materials sector.

events.name: DRC Cobalt Framework
events.wd_description: The Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) is organizing artisanal cobalt miners into larger-scale operations and introducing traceability mechanisms.
events.description: The Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) is organizing artisanal cobalt miners into larger-scale operations and introducing traceability mechanisms.

events.name: Chilean Lithium Quotas
events.wd_description: The Chilean government has implemented production quotas for major lithium miners and required compensation to local communities for water competition.
events.description: The Chilean government has implemented production quotas for major lithium miners and required compensation to local communities for water competition.

events.name: Transparency Mechanisms
events.wd_description: Implementing transparency mechanisms ensures that the sourcing and supply chain processes are visible and accountable.

events.name: Traceability Systems
events.wd_description: Traceability systems are designed to track the origin and movement of critical materials throughout the supply chain.
